title: Mushroom, squash and blue cheese risotto

ingredients.item: 500g bag frozen essential Waitrose Butternut Squash
300g pack essential Waitrose Cup Mushrooms, sliced

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the squash and onion, covered for 3 minutes. Stir in the mushrooms and fry for 2â€“3 minutes. Add the rice.
Cook gently for 20 minutes adding the stock a little at a time until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed. Stir in the chives and cheese.
